plugins.verifyConditionsCmd: echo 'Verifying build environment...' && npx ng version && echo 'Checking commit history...' && git log --oneline -10 && echo 'Testing commit analysis...' && echo 'Looking for breaking changes:' && git log --oneline -10 | grep -E 'feat!|BREAKING CHANGE' || echo 'No breaking changes found in recent commits'
plugins.prepareCmd: echo 'Semantic-release determined version: ${nextRelease.version}' && echo 'Updating library version to ${nextRelease.version}' && npm run update-lib-version ${nextRelease.version} && echo 'Verifying source update:' && cat projects/ng-apexcharts/package.json | grep version
echo 'Building ng-apexcharts...' && ng build ng-apexcharts && echo 'Verifying built version:' && cat dist/ng-apexcharts/package.json | grep version

plugins.publishCmd: echo 'About to publish:' && cat dist/ng-apexcharts/package.json | grep -E '"version|"name' && cd dist/ng-apexcharts && npm publish
